mapper.select: SELECT code AS code , code_nm AS codeNm , code_grp_cd AS group_code , chk_cd1 AS chk_cd1 , chk_cd2 AS chk_cd2 FROM TB_CODE WHERE CODE_GRP_CD IN ${code_grp_cd} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND CODE !='CODE' ORDER BY CODE_GRP_CD, ORD_NO

SELECT CORP_CD as code , CORP_NM as codeNm , 'CORP_CD' AS group_code FROM TB_CORP WHERE 1= 1 AND CORP_TYPE = 'LN' AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND CORP_CD = #{userCorpCd}
AND 1 = 1
AND 1 = 0
ORDER BY 2
SELECT CHAIN_NO AS code , CHAIN_NM AS codeNm , 'CHAIN_NO' AS group_code FROM TB_CHAIN WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND SVC_STAT IN ('O', 'R') ORDER BY CHAIN_NM

SELECT CL.LINK_CHAIN_NO AS code , CONCAT(TC.CHAIN_NM, ' (', TC.BIZ_NO, ') ', TU.USER_NM) as codeNm , 'LINK_CHAIN' AS group_code FROM TB_CHAIN_LINK CL JOIN TB_CHAIN TC ON TC.CHAIN_NO = CL.LINK_CHAIN_NO AND TC.SVC_STAT = 'O' AND TC.USE_YN = 'Y' JOIN TB_USER TU ON TU.USER_ID = TC.CEO_ID WHERE CL.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CL.CHAIN_NO = #{chain_no} ORDER BY 1

SELECT AGENCY_CD as code , AGENCY_NM as codeNm , 'AGENCY_CD' AS group_code FROM TB_AGENCY WHERE 1= 1
AND AGENCY_CD = #{userCorpCd}
AND 1 = 1
AND 1 = 1
AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY 2
